public class AddEvent extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity implements TimePickerListener, DatePickerListener
AddEvent Activity for creating new events within the Matata application. This activity allows users to input event details, select a date and time, upload an event poster, and generate a QR code. The event information is stored in Firebase Firestore and the image in Firebase Storage. Implements TimePickerListener and DatePickerListener for selecting event date and time.
